attributes.action: INDEFINITE LEAVE TO REMAIN NOT CHANGE FOR WHO CURRENTLY LEAVE IN UK
attributes.additional_details: Please propose them that Those who currently live in the uk or those who currently on the path way on ILR route they are not affect with this implementation
attributes.background: Currently government work on white paper rule that INDEFINITE LEAVE TO REMAIN duration 5 year to extend to 10 years

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
